title: Choose a Champ! 25 wins in a row. PLEASE READ
body:
~~I'm going to choose the most suggested (no spamming) or most up voted champion to ply with until I get 25 wins in a row (A.K.A have practically mastered them). You can choose any champ and feel free to add me if you ever want to watch a game. I will play the champion almost non-stop and once I'm one I'll get you to choose another. I'll be back in 24 hours to see the result.~~

I've chosen Karma, I know technically Yorick won but there's no way in hell I'm playing him. Karma seems like a good champ who i can play top, mid or support. Plus she can carry or help carry the game.

replies.body:
{{champion:83}} 

Dominates top lane, out sustains everyone, kid you not.
Isn't {{champion:83}}'s  ult basically a {{champion:82}}/{{champion:26}} but just not as good?

> [{quoted}](name=Renghis Khan,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=gREfse3I,comment-id=00020002,timestamp=2015-01-19T10:36:16.193+0000)
>
> Isn't {{champion:83}}'s  ult basically a {{champion:82}}/{{champion:26}} but just not as good?

Yorick's ult is an entirely different matter from {{champion:82}} and {{champion:26}} 's ult, since they all have different mechanics. Revive wise zilean's is superior, but yorick's also fully restore's the champion's mana, albeit for a limited time, thus yorick's ult can be useful on mages as well. It also creates a mirror image of the champ, which is harder to spot than zilean's ult, and can provide additional damage output even if the champion dies not die.

Mordekaiser' sand yorick's ult seem similar on first glance, but are actually very different. Mordekaiser' sis arguably much better as it drains a small amount of health, and the ghost scales off the champion itself as well as mordekaiser. Whereas yorick's ult is a defensive skill which scales off a small amount of the ally's stats only. However, mordekaiser's ult is essentially a time limit where you must kill the target, and the target will simply try to escape, while yorick's can be easily cast at any time.

Just going to add to this, Yorick's ult is better than both, especially if you have a hyper carry, because it guarantees another 10s of team fight potential. Yorick ults a friendly Vayne and she literally kills the rest of the enemy team before the timer runs out, whereas with the Zilean ult what usually happens is as soon as the champ is revived, they just get focussed again and die instantly. 

I actually play Yorick quite a lot and I love the fact he's so rare.

> [{quoted}](name=daveeyx,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=gREfse3I,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-01-19T08:43:16.363+0000)
>
> {{champion:83}} 
> 
> Dominates top lane, out sustains everyone, kid you not.

I remember facing a Yorick as Shen and I had no idea what he did at the time so I  played how I normally would as Shen but somehow I managed to poke Yorick out of lane, which now that I'm a little more knowledgeable seems like an impossible feat.

Anyway for champions I personally like Wukong. He can go jungle but has to make his first back quite early, he can go top and he can even go mid and do well against a fair few match ups.

he is a disgusting champ that needs to be stopped, had the worst game against one and i will never, i mean NEVER forget that game!!

He's too dirtyyy. A lot of setups let you spam fully once you get tear and it's like pressing a "no fun" button on your lane opponent.

Also lol @ OP mastering a champion in 25 games.

I won't be mastering a champion in 25 games, I'll be non-stop playing them until I win 25 normal or ranked games in a row. Which I consider to have mastered the champion, provided I don't get carried every game.
oh god no, I hate {{champion:83}}, but I guess if he wins then I'll play him.
Karma.

I'll do my best
Fuck yes man, glad you chose Karma. However after Ritos nurf , her Mantra E Sucks a bit.
Singed, why not?
Urgot
25 wins in a row? Bot games?
Normal and Ranked games only. Plus if you guys think that's too easy I can up it to 50.
pretty sure you're full of %%%% and just trying to get the uptokes

Actually if you take a look at my match history I've been playing a lot of Karma {{champion:43}} , the champ I chose. Plus it's all over now so I'm not expecting any upvotes or anything for that matter.
try someone off meta.... like a Janna or summin.
Sejuani. TOP!

25 wins in a row is a really unrealistic number. Being very good at a champion wont ever guarantee that many wins in a row, assuming you're playing against equally matched opponents (i.e, you're not smurfing). I've played over 1000 games and I doubt I've ever had that many wins in a row. Winning that many games in a row isn't about skill... it's about luck.

Unless you want to risk playing only Yorick for the rest of your life (or backing out of this challenge) you should really lower it to fifteen or even ten. Either that, or say "win 20 out of 25 games." It would still indicate that you're doing consistently well with the champ, without requiring such a crazy lucky streak when it comes to your teammates. Imagine you're at 24 wins then you get queued with a DC.

As for champ suggestions, {{champion:3}} . He's fun and decently strong, with a high enough skill cap that you probably wont get bored playing him over and over again.

{{champion:82}} 
additional challenge: you are not allowed to call lanes or communicate with your team. only quotes allowed are "HUEHUEHUEHUEHUEHUEHUE" or "MORDEKAISER NUMBERO UNO"
